workshopName: Intel innovations: The Generative AI revolution
tagline: Start your journey into Al with the basis of Al Evolution, oneAPI, Gen Al, GPT Prompt Engineering,LLM in a one day workshop!!!
description: Don't miss this opportunity to engage with hands-on experience in latest Intel technologies. Secure your spot now for a day that promises to connect you to the forefront of Al innovation! No prerequisites needed, only yourself and your laptop.

workshopName: Journey to Data Brilliance: Machine Learning and Beyond
tagline: Charting the Future: Navigating with Machine Learning
description: Embark on a journey into the realm of machine learning! Explore 'Linear Regression' for predictive analysis and ascertain algorithms towards 'Model Designing' for redefining future excellence . Unlock the power of data-driven decisions with us!
